data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pesic, Vladimir, Smit, Harry (2007): Water mite species of the genus Hydrodroma Koch (Acari: Hydrachnidia, Hydrodromidae) from Australia. Part II. Zootaxa 1509: 41-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177223
